languages.text: Лорд-инквизитор не принимает посетителей, занятый важными делами. Как бы вызывающе это ни звучало, Е{mf|го|е} Светлость не имеет другого способа встретиться с Калькасаром, кроме как ждать, пока он не призовет к себе Вольного Торговца.

The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than by waiting to be summoned.
languages.original_text: Лорд-инквизитор не принимает посетителей, занятый важными делами. Как бы вызывающе это ни звучало, Е{mf|го|е} Светлость не имеет другого способа встретиться с Калькасаром, кроме как ждать, пока он не призовет к себе Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than waiting for him to summon the Rogue Trader himself.

The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than waiting for him to summon the Rogue Trader himself.

The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than by waiting to be summoned.

The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than by waiting to be summoned.

languages.text: Le seigneur inquisiteur est trop occupé pour recevoir des visiteurs. Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} souhaite le rencontrer, {mf|il|elle} va devoir s'armer... de patience en attendant d'être {mf|convoqué|convoquée}.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than by waiting to be summoned.

traits.locale_text: Le seigneur inquisiteur est trop occupé pour recevoir des visiteurs. Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} souhaite le rencontrer, {mf|il|elle} va devoir s'armer... de patience en attendant d'être {mf|convoqué|convoquée}.

languages.text: 大审判官目前正忙着处理重要事务，不打算接见任何来访者。尽管这听起来非常无礼，但行商浪人目前只能等待卡尔卡扎的召见，别无他法。
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than by waiting to be summoned.

traits.locale_text: 审判长目前正忙着处理重要事务，不打算接见任何来访者。尽管这听起来非常无礼，但行商浪人目前只能等待卡尔卡扎的召见，别无他法。

languages.text: ロード・インクィジターは重要な案件に気を取られているため、来客とは一切面会していない。あまりにも大げさだと思われるかもしれないが、カルカサルから呼び出されるのをただ待つ以外に、面会する方法はない。
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than by waiting to be summoned.

traits.locale_text: ロード・インクィジターは重要な案件に気を取られているため、来客とは一切面会していない。あまりにも大げさだと思われるかもしれないが、カルカサルから呼び出されるのをただ待つ以外に、面会する方法はない。

languages.text: Der Großinquisitor empfängt keine Besucher, er ist mit wichtigen Angelegenheiten beschäftigt. So unglaublich es auch klingen mag, {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} hat keine andere Möglichkeit, sich mit Calcazar zu treffen, als zu warten, bis dieser eine Einladung ausspricht.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than by waiting to be summoned.

traits.locale_text: Der Großinquisitor empfängt keine Besucher, er ist mit wichtigen Angelegenheiten beschäftigt. So unglaublich es auch klingen mag, {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} hat keine andere Möglichkeit, sich mit Calcazar zu treffen, als zu warten, bis dieser eine Einladung ausspricht.

languages.text: El Lord Inquisidor no recibe visitas al estar ocupado con otros asuntos esenciales. Por osado que resulte este comportamiento, la única opción de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para ver a Calcazar es esperar a que este le haga llamar.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than by waiting to be summoned.

traits.locale_text: El Lord Inquisidor no recibe visitas al estar ocupado con otros asuntos esenciales. Por osado que resulte este comportamiento, la única opción de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para ver a Calcazar es esperar a que este le haga llamar.

languages.text: Lord Engizisyoncu, ithalat meseleleriyle ilgilendiği gerekçesiyle ziyaretçi kabul etmiyor. Kulağa fazla cüretkâr gelse de {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin Calcazar'la görüşebilmek için huzuruna çağrılmayı beklemekten başka çaresi yok.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor is not seeing any visitors on account of being preoccupied with matters of import. However daring it may sound, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has no other way of meeting with Calcazar other than by waiting to be summoned.
